div.div: Mount St. Joseph vs. Bluffton University

tr.td: MSJ wins coin toss and defers to second half
Porter kickoff 65 yards to the BU00, D. Fisher return 17 yards to the BU17 (Zeis).
C. Sheehan pass complete to M. Roberson for 2 yards to the BU19, out-of-bounds (Webb).
D. Carroll rush for 2 yards to the BU21 (Hardin; Jones).
C. Sheehan rush for no gain to the BU21 (Hardin).
J. Watkins punt 35 yards to the MSJ44, downed.

TEAM rush for loss of 8 yards to the MSJ36, fumble by TEAM recovered by MSJ Williams at MSJ36.

C. Sheehan pass intercepted by Hannah at the MSJ17, Hannah return 18 yards to the MSJ35 (E. Williams).
